SEARCH
Package Model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
Model.GameObject
Model.MovableObject
Model.Entity
Model.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Collidable, Observable
public class Player extends Entity
The Player class represents a player entity in the game. It extends the Entity class and implements functionalities such as managing player lives, handling invincibility, and notifying observers.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class Model.MovableObject
